Parameters.Name: GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT

Test.TestName: DOORCONTROL-2-1-7 GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT
Test.Name: Correct response with one token
Test.Description: Check GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT test when DUT returns GetDoorInfoListResponse with one token

Test.TestName: DOORCONTROL-2-1-7 GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT
Test.Name: Correct response with 3 tokens (MaxLimit is more than number of Door)
Test.Description: Check GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT test when DUT returns GetDoorInfoListResponse with 3 tokens, MaxLimit=10

Test.TestName: DOORCONTROL-2-1-7 GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT
Test.Name: Correct response with 3 tokens (MaxLimit = number of Door)
Test.Description: Check GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT test when DUT returns GetDoorInfoListResponse with 3 tokens, MaxLimit=3

Test.TestName: DOORCONTROL-2-1-7 GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT
Test.Name: Correct response with 4 tokens (MaxLimit is less than number of Door)
Test.Description: Check GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT test when DUT returns GetDoorInfoListResponse with 5 tokens, MaxLimit=3

Test.TestName: DOORCONTROL-2-1-7 GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT
Test.Name: Incorrect response - equal DoorInfo item(Limit = MaxLimit, Offset = 0)
Test.Description: Check GET DOOR INFO LIST – OFFSET AND LIMIT test when DUT returns 2 equal DoorInfo items in the GetDoorInfoList with Limit = MaxLimit, Offset = 0

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DOORCONTROL-2-1-7 GET DOOR INFO LIST - OFFSET AND LIMIT
STEP 1 - Get Door Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceDoor11/DoorService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that the DUT returned service capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get DoorInfo list with limit = 10 and offset =0 Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that result is not null STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Validate response received The following tokens are not unique: tokenDoorPoint2, tokenDoorPoint2 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
